nodes.text: The Memorial Shrine was a monument dedicated to all who had died during the Mandalorian Civil War. Located on the top floor of Peace Park in the planet Mandalore's capital city of Sundari, the structure was dominated by a split spire. In the year 21 BBY, the Memorial Shrine was shattered in a bombing engineered by the Death Watch. Though Duchess Satine Kryze ordered the statue left in its broken state as a warning against pointless violence, the monument was removed entirely during the Imperial occupation of Mandalore.
